title: Globulo Rojo® Liquid Dietary Supplement with High Potency Iron & B Vitamins 16 FL OZ (473 mL)
cleaned_text: See What People Are Saying 1 Review Only logged in customers who have purchased this product may write a review. $17.99 Globulo Rojo has been trusted by American families unique formula is a liquid dietary supplement with high-potency Vitamin B 12 and Iron. Vitamin B 12 supports red blood cell formation and is especially helpful for people with a B12 deficiency or vegans who may not get enough B12 their diet.* It's free of sugar, caffeine, dairy, wheat, soy and animal ingredients and has very low sodium. Suitable for vegetarians. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, Globulo Rojo® made in the USA in an FDA regulated facility. All raw materials go through a rigorous quality control process prior to production. The finished product is then subjected to a number of laboratory tests before it is released for sale by Quality Assurance staff. The recommended dosage is 3 tablespoons per day. Children under 18 years of age. If you are taking any medications, are planning a medical procedure, are pregnant or lactating or have any medical condition, consult your doctor before use. We recommend you store the product in a cool, dry place, tightly closed. It does not need to be refrigerated. Since excessive Iron is poisonous for children under 6, it is especially important to keep it tightly closed and out of reach of children. Yes. Before using Globulo Rojo® you should consult with your doctor who is familiar with your medications and possible interactions with other substances. No. Globulo Rojo® has a best buy date which is printed prominently on the bottle and the box. Iron supplements may interact with certain medications. If you are planning a medical procedure, are pregnant or lactating or have any medical condition, consult your doctor before use. Discontinue use and consult your doctor if any adverse reactions occur. Store in a cool, dry place. Do not use if plastic seal around cap is missing or broken. Accidental overdose of iron-containing products is a leading cause of fatal poisoning in children under 6. KEEP THIS PRODUCT OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
